titleStmt.title: Foure sermons The two first, of godly feare: on Hebrewes 4. verse 1. By Robert Cleauer. The two last. Of Christian loue and life. On Canticles 2. verse 10. By Richard Webb.
titleStmt.author: Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625.
Webb, Richard, preacher of God's word. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Snodham, for Roger Iackson, and are to be sould at his shop neere to Fleetstreet Conduit,

notesStmt.note: "Two sermons. Of Christian loue and life" by Richard Webb has separate pagination and dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere to Fleetstreet Conduit
